H0.text: What is the name of the strong material found in plant cell walls. Cellulose

H1.text: What is the name of the strong material found in plant cell walls. Lignin

H2.text: What is the name of the strong material found in plant cell walls. Chitin

H3.text: What is the name of the strong material found in plant cell walls. E460

A4.text: Cellulose is an important structural component of the cell walls of green plants, many forms of algae, and the oomycetes.

A5.text: The high tensile strength of plant stems and of the tree wood also arises from the arrangement of cellulose fibers intimately distributed into the lignin matrix.
